20110127024507.000|20110127024511.000|CC1|       STIFFNESS, FATIGUE,

20110127024515.000|20110127024515.000|CC1|    IT MAY LOWER YOUR ABILITY

20110127024517.000|20110127024519.000|CC1|              EVENTS

20110127024519.000|20110127024521.000|CC1|          TUBERCULOSIS,         
20110127024521.000|20110127024523.000|CC1|   LYMPHOMA, AND OTHER CANCERS, 
20110127024523.000|20110127024523.000|CC1|      AND NERVOUS SYSTEM AND    
20110127024523.000|20110127024525.000|CC1|  BLOOD DISORDERS HAVE OCCURRED.
20110127024525.000|20110127024527.000|CC1|     BEFORE STARTING Enbrel,

20110127024529.000|20110127024532.000|CC1|     OR HAVE LIVED IN AN AREA   
20110127024532.000|20110127024532.000|CC1| WHERE CERTAIN FUNGAL INFECTIONS
20110127024532.000|20110127024533.000|CC1|           ARE COMMON.

20110127024533.000|20110127024536.000|CC1|    AN INFECTION LIKE THE FLU.

20110127024539.000|20110127024539.000|CC1|       HAVE CUTS OR SORES,

20110127024652.000|20110127024653.000|CC1|REDUCING HER MONTHLY PAYMENTS.
